admst:warning.format:
Collapse error: Node collapse conditional depends on variable %(name), which is not an input parameter and which has scope of '%(scope)'.

 Only variables of global_instance or global_model scope may be used in collapse conditionals in this version of Xyce/ADMS.

 To clear this error, move bias-independent intialization of %(name) into an '@(initial_instance)' or '@(initial_model) block.
